io.mosip.registration.dao

Interface MachineMappingDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MachineMappingDAOImpl

    public interface MachineMappingDAO
    This DAO interface updates the mapping of users and devices to the Registration Center Machine
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    YASWANTH S, Brahmananda Reddy
